description: Devonian Health Group Inc. engages in the development of botanical drugs. Its lead product candidate is Thykamine, a Phase IIa clinical trial product for the treatment of ulcerative colitis and atopic dermatitis. The company also develops Pantoprazole Magnesium for the treatment of gastric or duodenal ulcers; Cleo-35 for the treatment of hormonal acne in women; and value-added products for dermo-cosmetics. In addition, it acquires drug and health product licenses; and distributes pharmaceutical products. Devonian Health Group Inc. has a strategic alliance with CannTx Life Sciences Inc. for the development of cannabinoid-based pharmaceutical drugs. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Québec, Canada.
